programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 132
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 131
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 8
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Simpsons 29 - EP 3
programme.desc: Homer launches Maggie's baby-celebrity career with her whistling talent.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 - EP 8
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: The Noise S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel - EP 6
programme.desc: For many years Manu Feildel has dreamt of travelling the route of Jules Vern's Around the World in 80 Days, and discovering the food that would have featured had it been his adventure. Over a long lunch with his "long suffering" agent, who has heard him talk about his dream for many years.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 19
programme.desc: (Encore) Cardi B, Chance The Rapper and T.I. will chat about their new hip-hop talent series, "Rhythm and Flow," the first Netflix singing competition show. Other guests are Nacho Figueras ("10th Annual Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic") and the new supergroup The Highwaywomen who perform "Redesigning Women".

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S3 - EP 18
programme.desc: Mat Yoyo - The New Generation is an educational program in its third season and continues to provide children with wholesome family edu-tainment and fun.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 3
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers make a trip to the jungle to reunite a shy pangolin with its mother. There, the Junior Rangers come face to face with a ferocious tiger! The Junior Rangers take a young giant panda to China to search for a bamboo forest. But what happens when the panda strays off on its own?

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 45
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 27
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 28
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Super Wings S4: Super Charge - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: Jett, the adorable little red plane, continues his adventures and missions all around the world!

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth - who wants to steal their Miraculouses - from wreaking havoc on the town.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 18
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1 - EP 0017 & 0018
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S4 - Tournament Of Elements - EP 9
programme.desc: When Zane sacrificed himself to stop the Golden Master, the power of the Golden Weapons unlocked new abilities within him, revealing a new layer of titanium. The immense energy dispatch destroyed parts of him and caused Zane to vanish into the Digiverse. Only P.I.X.A.L. was aware of Zane's digital presence or so she thought...

programme.title: Snoops - EP 10
programme.desc: Mallory, Nadia and Juraimi fake a ghostly encounter to prank Yew Kang, Ms. Tasha and their friends while out on a camping trip - but find that a monster may really be on the loose! Alix digs deeper into the mystery of Vik's stalker, and how his father may be involved, and uncovers something disturbing.

programme.title: Eat The Week - EP 4

programme.desc: (R) Pei Qi grew up in a well-to-do family. As a result of a turn of events, her parents decided to offer their services as student caretakers, and converted their bungalow into a "student hostel" for international kids. From then on, children from all over the world started to move in. These kids from different countries were initially resistant and dismissive of one another. As Pei Qi witnesses their loneliness and yearning for home, she puts herself in their shoes and finally realizes how fortunate she is. Pei Qi starts to reach out and make friends with them. Through mutual support and learning, they built a sincere friendship that transcends geographical boundaries. (重)一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

programme.title: 东方七色花 Orient Rainbow Flower - EP 0009 & 0010
programme.desc: Orient Rainbow Flower explores history and the future, inheritance and development. 《东方七色花》是探讨历史与未来、传承与发展的节目。.

programme.title: 家简尘除 House Everything? - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Linda and her family have been bothered by the cluttered state of their living room. And this has also adversely affected their family cohesiveness. programme.title: 众里寻一 The Destined One - EP 1

Celebrities will also play the role of Cupid to help the guests determine their Destined One. Only one candidate will make it through the final round to express his feeling to the girl he likes. Will he succeed? Stay tuned. (重)首集，6位才貌出众的女嘉宾，面对4位来自各行各业的有缘人，通过艺人红娘、月老的推荐，还有彼此交流之后，哪一位有缘人率先被女嘉宾淘汰？两位分数较高的有缘人还会带来精彩的才艺表演，为自己加分！而最终成功被留下的有缘人到底是谁，他能否表白成功？请拭目以待！.

programme.title: 哎哟我的妈 Oh Mother! - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) "Oh Mother!"presents the all too familiar in-law conflicts as well as current attitudes towards marriage and family values. The story revolves around the stubborn and domineering old Mrs Yang, her calculative Taiwanese daughter-in-law, her straight-talking Chinese daughter-in-law, her nosey daughter, and her sons who are caught in the middle. Casts: Zhu Mimi, Marcus Chin, Chew Chor Meng, Quan Yifeng, Pan Lingling. (重)退休了的杨老妈跟老三光荣和中国媳妇温柔，以及小儿子德华一起住，婆媳共处，本来就存有不少问题。大儿子大富也带了妻子美凤和女儿搬回来住。从此大富就夹在老妈、老婆中间，加上妹妹的兴风作浪，还有弟媳的"民族情意结",处于水深火热的他该如何是好？三个女人一个墟，何况家里有5个女人。他会不会成为"墟"里的"牺牲品"呢？....演员：朱咪咪, 陈建彬, 周初明, 权怡凤, 潘玲玲.

programme.title: 最强岳母 Mightiest Mother-In-Law - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) At the hospital, Ke'en intentionally topples the soup Shuhui has brought. Both of them are hurt. Shuhui is heartbroken when Hongzhe showers Ke'en with care but neglects her. Zhongming attends to Shuhui's injuries, and their friendship deepens. Chen Jian is upset Wanling does not reciprocate his feelings. He confesses his love again. Startled, she runs off in a panic. (PG)(重)香兰中风行动不便，可恩为了照顾她而吃尽苦头，几乎崩溃，在宏哲面前却表现出任劳任怨的样子。淑慧上门来送汤，可恩说香兰不想看到她，淑慧只好低声下气求可恩喂香兰喝汤。可恩告诉香兰汤是她自己炖的，淑慧无奈。.

Xiuzhu's investigations uncover Ke'en's affair with her professor, Huo Yingjie, 10 years ago. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)秀珠发现可恩与已逝的霍教授10年前曾有过一段情，闹得满城风雨，便说服霍太太帮忙录制指证可恩的视频作为证据，然后寄给宏哲。宏哲试探可恩，可恩说谎，令宏哲对她大失所望。可恩以退为进，向宏哲提出分手，并搬离齐家。.

What pushes her on, in spite of her lack of parents' support, and financial pressures to earn her keep? What drives her fight to overcome her inner fears? (重)新加坡也有职业摔角手吗？要在台上任打任挨已不容易，更何况是当一名女性职业摔角手。新加坡第一名全职女摔角手李欣仪在过去6年里是如何在实战中，改变大众的刻板印象？24岁的欣仪是如何面对家人的反对，收入的不稳定，在自己的人生擂台上，进行了一场又一场的极限拼搏，活出自信？.

programme.title: 愿者上钩 CyberPunk'D - EP 1

(重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 30分钟煮一餐 Quick Cuisine - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Career is still pretty much a dominant part of Singaporeans' lives. As such, most Singaporeans resort to eating out rather than going home to enjoy a sumptuous home-cooked meal. Working mothers always aspire to let their children and family enjoy a nutritious home-cooked meal. Hence, Quick Cuisine offers to inform all on how to prepare a meal in 30 minutes or less. (重)人们经常在外用餐，其实心里都非常渴望吃家常菜，尤其是忙碌的职业妇女虽然有女佣代劳，难得下厨，不过她们其实也很希望在特别的日子里，为家人和孩子准备美食。因此，为忙碌的专业和工作人士提供容易处理而且又营养丰富的食谱和烹饪秘诀，将会广受欢迎。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans of the Earth - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. (重)主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In America, the homeless are known for a few things- either they are loonies, junkies or unemployed bums. In the coastal city of Eureka, California, however, this shunned and despised community has found a listening ear in an unlikely figure- a 70-year-old Chinese woman called Betty. (重)在美国，无家可归者都被贴上一个标签：他们不是神经病患者，就是嗜毒者或窝囊废。不过，在加利福尼亚州的一个小城市，无家可归者却有一个愿意聆听、帮助、照顾他们的人。她叫做Betty，是一个年过七旬的华裔妇女。.

programme.title: 甜蜜和风味 Sweet Tales From Tokyo - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) A travelogue featuring all sweet treats Japanese! (重).

programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Displeased with the fact that Taihao has forsaken her for Wu Chun, Yalan decides to sabotage Wu Chun by fabricating evidence of Wu Chun exchanging the company's wine-formulating recipe for monetary gains. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰浩为了吴春离开雅兰，令雅兰心有不甘。雅兰于是制造吴春泄露公司机密的画面陷害吴春。菊熙获知神仙酒的酿制秘方落入他人手中，怀疑吴春一早就在打秘方的主意。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 40
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yalan arranges for a stack of photographs to be sent to Juxi. She then places an envelope full of money in Wu Chun's drawer. The photographs and money lead Juxi to be certain that Wu Chun has sold out the company. Juxi thus orders Wu Chun to leave the company immediately. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰安排一人把一堆对吴春不利的照片寄到丰吉堂，然后再把一袋钱放进吴春的抽屉里。内部调查人员在吴春的抽屉里找到钱。菊熙看到照片和钱后认定吴春真的出卖公司，对吴春彻底失望，命令她立刻离开公司。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 11
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Huijing searches for her grandma's medical record in the hospital branch but is informed that medical records more than ten years old have been destroyed. She tries to look for Dr Jin Zhixian who has kept the operation records instead. Zhihong notices that his father is showing signs of cancer relapse. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧静到分院去查奶奶的资料，却被通知十年以上的病历都已销毁了。她只好设法去找当年做手术记录的金致贤医生。智弘注意到父亲斗植的癌症有复发的迹象。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 12
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Ruiyu feels humiliated after Yundao again rejects her confession of love, so she slaps him. Huijing learns that Zhihong is troubled by his father's operation. She tries to console him. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)瑞雨再次向允道表白遭拒。瑞雨感觉被允道的拒绝侮辱了，最终掴了允道两巴掌。慧静无意中听到允道和智弘谈论有关智弘父亲手术的对话，得悉智弘处于困境。慧静试图安慰他。.

programme.title: 百变达人 Beyond Show - EP 5
programme.desc: An entertaining talent competition with participants from Japan, Italy, China etc. The judges are Wilber Pan, Patty Hou, Li Bo and Liu Yan. 《百变达人》集结了导播、灯光、舞美、视觉、置景、秀导团队，百人共创。以独特的创意呈现，将不同的表演形式，通过创意的、科技的、艺术的加工。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Singaporeans consume 5 million eggs every day, but where do these eggs come from? In this episode, follow host Huang Jinglun as he takes on the daunting task of bringing 37,000 newly hatched chicks from Melaka to a Singapore egg farm, where they will play a critical role in local egg production. (重)新加坡人每天食用500万颗鸡蛋，但你可知道这些鸡蛋从哪里来的吗？这一集的《极件任务》，让我们跟随特派员黄靖伦到马六甲一间孵化场，看他如何把3万7千只刚破壳而出的小鸡，安全地带到新加坡。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 13
programme.desc: Ketsurang displays her culinary skills and cooks a feast. Even Det's mother couldn't resist the food. On the way back from the market, Det accidentally falls into the water. In order to save him, Ketsurang performs mouth-to-mouth resuscitation on him. (PG)佳苏兰大显厨艺，做了一顿好菜。连德特母亲也吃得津津有味。德特带佳苏兰到市场定制新锅具。返程途中，德特不慎掉落水。为了救德特，佳苏兰对他做人工呼吸。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 14
programme.desc: Ketsurang performs mouth-to-mouth resuscitation on Det in public. In order to preserve Ketsurang's reputation, Det tells his father of his intention to marry Ketsurang. Det's father suggests that they first enter into engagement. (PG)佳苏兰在大庭广众下为德特做人工呼吸。为避免佳苏兰声誉受损，德特主动向父亲提出要娶佳苏兰。德特父亲于是建议德特和佳苏兰先订婚。.

programme.desc: (R) A musical variety show where every week three lucky fans are chosen to sing along with their favourite invited singer. (重)《嗨唱起来》，大型全民嗨唱互动音乐综艺秀，节目定位全民嗨唱、最强互动、星素结合、甄选新秀通过素人歌手对层层关卡的挑战，孵化素人"歌神“ 。星素合唱，推进“全民共唱"概念，实现场内外投票竞猜外同步共唱，线上线下无缝连接.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Secret Singapore is an investigative-style travelogue, where our roving detective-host digs for clues, and snoops for hush-hush places and people here. Our host will go knee-deep in mud, track through jungles, creep through barbed wire fences, just to give you that exclusive access. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S10 - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (重)(双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Most of the post-90 generation graduates are caught in jobs with long working hours and low pay. But for one brave soul, she chooses to exit and follow her heart. Beijing is home to many migrant worker families and for some, affordable child care means relying on willing and tired grandparents. And for some of the elderly migrant workers, after enduring many years of loneliness and hardship to support their family, they're faced with imminent retrenchment. (重)90后大学毕业生受不了电商工作加班无休，毅然裸辞去追梦。北漂夫妻在北京养育幼儿， 昂贵的生活负担迫使双方家长倾力协助。在北京15年孤苦的日子，年近七旬的清洁工，只望儿子顺利大学毕业。看北漂人为成就北京梦而奔走。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places for the ultimate experience and will also showcase the places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan etc. (重)这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，参观名胜古迹,享受终极的体验。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 41

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 42
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Juxi finds out from Malu that Wu Chun is Bolan. Juxi is deeply regretful of chasing Wu Chun out of the company and for the slap that she gave Wu Chun previously. Malu informs Wu Chun of the identities of her birth parents. Wu Chun runs away when she cannot accept what she has been told. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)菊熙从马陆口中发现吴春就是波兰，后悔之前把吴春赶出丰吉堂还打她一巴掌。马陆到金龙甲的家找吴春，告诉她正基和菊熙就是她的亲生父母。吴春一时之间无法接受，再度失踪。.

Ruiyu is jealous of Huijing who's getting the attention of both Yundao and Zhihong. She reports on Huijing to the hospital for accepting a patient's luxury car as gift. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)允道总算争取到了和慧静吃午饭的机会；但吃饭的时候，慧静明确告诉他只爱智弘一个人，拒绝了他的追求。瑞雨因妒忌慧静得到允道和智弘的宠爱，不削地向医院的监察组举报了慧静收受患者送的车。.

"中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.desc: The Vishwas are in the wedding business and the Segarens run a funeral business. Weddings and Funerals are polar opposites and so are these two families, due to past differences. As fate would have it, the inheritors of both businesses cross paths and love blossoms! Like any other Shakespearean theatre play the series embeds itself with elements of theatre, literature, romance, power, betrayal, egoism, history, comedy, tragedy and redemption!

programme.title: Galatta 360 - Talkshow - EP 1
programme.desc: Galatta 360 is a brand new talkshow series that aims to educate, entertain, and mostimportantly, chase away those Monday blues! It will connect with viewers not only throughtraditional broadcast platforms, but also through digital media, particularly on social mediaplatforms. Galatta 360 is a highly engaging format will include audience interaction throughnew and refreshing ways.

programme.title: YAAR 3 - EP 29
programme.desc: With Sathish's death amid investigations, Jana tries to connect the dots after learning about the threats Sathish left his sister. Nathiya is panicking as she is a suspect. She tells Nila to lie for her. Could she be behind this murder?

programme.title: Kalaba Kadhala - EP 21
programme.desc: Sasi is bracing himself to tell the truth about his betrayal to Karthik. Can he bring himself to do it?

programme.title: Maalai Maathurum - EP 34
programme.desc: A compilation of yesteryear programmes, only on Vasantham!

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track. S1 E1 – Songwriters Nic Da Kid, Lily Kiing and Piers James get randomly paired up with producers Melle Brown, TwoSeven and Tokyo the Producer in this round as they work together to create an original track.

programme.title: Pretty Sweet
programme.sub-title: A Girl and Chocolate skateboard film
programme.desc: Skateboarding's two hottest teams, Girl and Chocolate, combine forces to deliver a blockbuster skate movie. With Hollywood-level cinematography, effects and star power, Girl and Chocolate deliver a masterpiece skateboard film. Featuring Sean Malto, Guy Mariano, Marc Johnson and more, Pretty Sweet showcases fun and jaw-dropping skating in equal measure.

programme.title: Menno vs Wing
programme.desc: Ronnie catches up with Menno to talk about his 2017 Red Bull BC One World Championship battle against Wing. Ronnie catches up with Menno to take an in-depth look back at his 2017 Red Bull BC One World Final battle against Wing in his home country of the Netherlands.

programme.title: Ami vs San Andrea
programme.desc: Ronnie catches up with B-Girl Ami to take a look back at her battle in the 2018 Red Bull BC One World Final. Ronnie from the Red Bull BC One All Stars catches up with B-Girl Ami to take a look back at her battle in the the 2018 Red Bull BC One World Final in Zurich, Switzerland against San Andrea.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge. Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.

programme.title: The crevasse
programme.desc: Air Zermatt’s teamwork is put to the ultimate test when a skier falls into a 30m glacial crevasse. Air Zermatt’s teamwork is put to the ultimate test when a skier falls into the darkness of a 30m glacial crevasse. In a race against time, the team must pull him out from the depths before the ice shifts and encases him in a frozen tomb.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: The boys arrive in Crete and start skating the plethora of perfect plazas, piazzas, and paved pathways. Chris Haslam, Sierra Fellers, Max Kruglov, Dima Rodionov, Yura Renov, and Giorgio Zavos arrive in Crete and immediately start taking advantage of the island's skate-friendly plazas and streets. It's a line skater's paradise with features galore.

programme.title: Keep Your Eyes Open
programme.desc: When cruising through Crete, keeping an eye on the surroundings can mean finding the best skate spots. Chris Haslam, Sierra Fellers, Max Kruglov, Dima Rodionov, Yura Renov and Giorgio Zavos find that keeping an eye out while sightseeing can uncover epic skate spots. Some banks, rails, and ledges spied by accident wind up resulting in killer shots.

programme.title: ABC of... BMX
programme.desc: BMX has a long and rich history of the most creative riders constantly taking the sport above and beyond. BMX, or Bicycle Motocross, has a long and rich history of the most creative riders constantly taking the sport above and beyond. Get to know the ways this sport has continued to develop and fan out in new ways thanks to so many pioneers.

programme.title: ABC of... Cliff diving
programme.desc: Get to know the art of falling as the top divers give an inside look at cliff diving. Get to know the art of falling as the top divers give an inside look at cliff diving. Jumping from almost three times the olympic height these divers find a way to look past fear and take a leap.

programme.title: Reverence
programme.desc: This film delves into the psyche of elite mountain bike athletes in a bid to understand their motivation. This film delves into the psyche of elite mountain bike athletes in a bid to understand their motivation to tirelessly pursue their legacy.

programme.title: Forced Perspective
programme.sub-title: The story of artist Derek Hess
programme.desc: Walking the tightrope between creativity and mental illness has given life to artist Derek Hess’s work. Artist Derek Hess’s journey includes alcoholism and bipolar disorder, but these demons have inspired emotionally evocative work that hangs in renowned galleries such as the Louvre in Paris.

programme.title: Snowmads – Sense of Home
programme.desc: Join Fabian Lentsch and his Snowmads as they spend the 2018-19 winter at home in the Austrian mountains. After trips to Iran and Greece, Fabian Lentsch and his Snowmads are spending the 2018-19 winter at home in the Austrian mountains, touring around with the Snowmads truck and chasing perfect powder.

programme.title: Riding a mint Honda 125
programme.desc: After a gruelling 18 days working on his Honda 125, it’s time for Aaron Colton see how well it runs. After a gruelling 18 days working on his Honda 125, it’s time to see how well it runs. While Aaron Colton is no professional motocross racer, Day in the Dirt is far and away his favourite event of the year.

programme.title: Karl Meltzer: Made to Be Broken
programme.desc: Ultrarunner Karl Meltzer embarks on his third and final attempt to run the Appalachian Trail in record time. Ultrarunner Karl Meltzer has long dreamed of setting the speed record for crossing the USA's Appalachian Trail. Now he sets out for his third and final attempt to run the 3,524km (2,188 miles) in less than 46 days, 8 hours and 6 minutes.

programme.title: Embarking on a journey
programme.desc: René Wildhaber recounts the Swiss origins of his imaginative off-road biking-meets-USA-history project. MTB pro René Wildhaber recounts how his imagination was fired up when he first read about the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and how it led to his off-road biking-meets-USA-history project.

programme.title: In soldiers' footsteps
programme.desc: From campfires to old-school riding, René Wildhaber quickly gains respect for the Buffalo Soldier bikers. MTB riders René Wildhaber and Ross Schnell begin their journey to discover the origins of the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and they quickly gain respect for what these men accomplished.

programme.title: The Whole Enchilada
programme.desc: René Wildhaber takes on The Whole Enchilada trail, then goes horse-riding with a family of authentic cowboys. MTB pro René Wildhaber fulfills a lifelong dream of riding the legendary bike trail, The Whole Enchilada in Utah, and goes horse-riding with a family of real cowboys.

programme.title: Frozen Titans
programme.desc: A story of Will Gadd's obsession with mixed climbing up the frozen 140 meter cave behind Helmcken Falls. Mixed climber Will Gadd looks to push the boundaries of the sport by climbing the frozen 140m cave behind Helmcken Falls. Facing freezing temps, exhaustion, and an ever-changing landscape, Will's obsession is the cutting edge of ice climbing.

programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track. S1 E1 – Songwriters Nic Da Kid, Lily Kiing and Piers James get randomly paired up with producers Melle Brown, TwoSeven and Tokyo the Producer in this round as they work together to create an original track.
